SELECT spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo, spt.ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name ItemName, spt.MachineCode, eit.Equipment_Info_Name MachineName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 ItemSTND1, pit.Product_Info_STND_2 ItemSTND2, dt.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type ItemMaterial, sum(spt.Qty) Qty, spt.Create_Date FROM Small_Packaging_tbl spt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON spt.ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON spt.MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_1 = dt.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CLSFC_2 = dt2.CHILD_TBL_NO INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No
WHERE spt.Create_Date >= #{startDate} AND spt.Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND spt.MachineCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{MachineCode},'%')
GROUP BY spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo WITH ROLLUP

SELECT spt.*, pit.Product_Item_Name ItemName, eit.Equipment_Info_Name MachineName FROM Small_Packaging_tbl spt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON spt.ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON spt.MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code
WHERE spt.Small_Packaging_LotNo = #{LotNo}

SELECT A.Small_Packaging_LotNo, A.ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name ItemName, sum(A.Qty) Qty, B.Product_Info_STND_1 ItemStnd1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 ItemStnd2, C.Child_TBL_Type ItemMaterial_Name, D.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc1_Name, E.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc2_Name, A.Create_Date FROM Small_Packaging_tbl A left outer join Sales_Packing_tbl Z on A.Small_Packaging_LotNo = Z.Sales_Small_Packing_LotNo inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on B.Product_Material = C.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL D on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = D.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = E.Child_TBL_No where Z.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo is null and A.ItemCode = #{ItemCode} and A.MachineCode = #{MachineCode} group by A.Small_Packaging_LotNo
